page.title: 03Population in Yeovil.
page.content: The following figures relate to the Preston,South and West Wards. The{total}number of residents in the three wards was{13350}with 6387 (47.8%) males and 6963 (52.2%) females. Between 1971 and 1981 there was a {fall in}population in two of the areas,{Preston and West},but in the{ {South Ward}the population has grown by {33.8%}.This is probably due to the construction of a large new housing estate in the Yew Tree area. Suprisingly,only 21% of the population in the South ward was under 16 years in 1981,whilst about 20% were of pensionable age. Preston Ward has the highest proportion of both young and old people.
